caption.p: Cyclic voltammograms of the B(OMgCl) 3-based electrolyte in ( a) triglyme and ( b) triglyme-THF measured at a scan rate of 5 mV/s at 20 °C. Linear sweep voltammograms of the B(OMgCl) 3-based electrolyte with Pt (blue), glassy carbon (red), Mo (green), SUS (light blue), and Al (orange) electrodes in ( c) triglyme and ( d) triglyme-THF measured at a scan rate of 5 mV/s.
